title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

altTitles.ja: カードキャプターさくら クリアカード編

altTitles.vi: Card Captor Sakura - Thẻ bài pha lê

description.en: It is spring, with cherry trees in full blossom, and Sakura is just entering middle school. Her beloved Syaoran has returned from Hong Kong, and life couldn't be better. But when she awakens from a strange dream to find her Sakura Cards powerless, how can she protect Tomoeda from disaster?! [Kodansha]
description.ru: Сакура уже учится в первом классе средней школы! Наша героиня продолжает жить своей обычной жизнью. Магическими картами нет пользоваться нужды. Все хорошо и никаких больше беспокойств не происходит. И даже более того! Сакура наконец-то смогла увидеться с Шаораном! Он возвратился, и теперь будет учиться вместе с нашей героиней в одной школе! Радости нет предела. Но что за странный сон ни с того ни с сего вдруг видит Сакура? Почему карты стали прозрачными? Почему странные события вновь начали происходить? И что они означают?
description.pt-br: O mangá ocorre após a graduação de Sakura na Escola Elementar Tomoeda, em seu primeiro ano de escola secundária. Sakura tem um misterioso sonho, e um incidente ocorre.

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER - Momi no Ki to Tetsu no Hane no Majo

altTitles.en: GIRLS und PANZER - The Fir Tree and the Iron-Winged Witch

altTitles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー樅の木と鉄の羽の魔女

description.en: The manga centers around Noemi Kohiyama, a second-year student at Count High School, a school with no established reputation in the world of tankery. Her first match as a tank commander is against Saunders University High School. She directs the crew of her tank with her orders, and she follows the orders of their team leader. At that time, she remembers the words that her senior said to her.

title.en: Neet Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました

altTitles.en: Somehow, I started Living with a NEET Kunoichi

description.en:
Otaku Kunoichi ≒ Otaku NEET ≒ Girl with Zero Romantic Experience!

A normal salaryman, Tsukasa, is attacked by a Youma and is gallantly saved by the appearance of the genius kunoichi, Shizuri. However, when she is not working, she becomes an otaku NEET... Today, Tsukasa's househusband skills will continue to spoil Shizuri. A prescription delivered directly to you♪

The Comic Walker version of "NEET de Otaku na Kunoichi to naze ka Dousei hajimemashita". The story is almost 1 to 1 with the doujinshi excluding chapter 1.

With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: アスラの沙汰

description.en: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
description.pt-br: "Faça apenas boas ações". — Asura segue os ensinamentos de sua falecida mãe e sempre se esforça para fazer o bem. Não importa o quanto seja zoado, continua com um sorriso, acreditando firmemente que os malfeitores receberão uma punição divina. Até que, certo dia, um velho agourento lhe oferece uma chave que pode abrir os Portões do Inferno...

title.en: 30-sai made Doutei de Itara Mahou Shoujo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 30歳まで童貞でいたら魔法少女になりました

altTitles.en: I Was a Virgin Until I Was 30 so I Was Turned Into a Magical Girl

description.en:
"When you are a virgin until you are 30, you will become a wizard." A famous joke around the Internet… is what I thought, but to think that it actually happened to me!

Wait, but this isn't a wizard? Eh? Magical girl? Why?

Comedy manga about magical girls who used to be old virgin guys!

---

[Alternative Niconico raws](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39350)

altTitles.ja: 不運からの最強男

description.en:
After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
description.id:
Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?

altTitles.ja: からくりサーカス

description.en:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
description.es-la:
Katou Narumi (19 años) sufre el síndrome de Zonapha, una rara dolencia que le impide respirar a menos que haga reír a la gente. Se ha visto obligado a abandonar su entrenamiento en kenpo chino y a regresar a Japón, donde ahora trabaja como payaso. El único problema: no es muy divertido.  
  
Un día conoce a Saiga Masaru (11), el reciente heredero de una enorme fortuna, que le hace reír por primera vez en todo el día. Cuando se da cuenta de que Masaru es perseguido por unos asesinos, interviene para proteger al chico, sólo para descubrir que, en lugar de armas convencionales, los asesinos empuñan enormes y espeluznantes marionetas. Pronto se encuentran con la misteriosa Shirogane (de edad desconocida), que controla una marioneta propia y afirma que fue enviada desde Francia por el difunto abuelo de Masaru para protegerlo.  
  
Sus caminos se entrelazan y divergen, dividiéndose en dos historias: Karakuri y el Circo, marionetas y artistas, lágrimas y risas. El extraño circo de muñecos vivientes que propaga el síndrome de Zonapha, las marionetas humanas conocidas colectivamente como los Shirogane, y los titiriteros cuyo rencor imperecedero puso en marcha las dos partes de este espectáculo.

title.en: Ore wa Akutou de wa Arimasen

altTitles.ja: 俺は悪党ではありません

description.en: Cain von Euclid, grandson of the First King who unified the First Continent, learns from his respected grandfather that he is destined to become the strongest villain. Being unable to kill his grandson, the grandfather takes Cain on a journey to make him strong enough to overcome his fate. For 13 years, they travel across the Second, Third, and the Fourth Continent, where Cain achieved tremendous power. Finally, Cain sets off on a lone adventure where he meets many people who influence him. Will he be able to defy destiny and avoid becoming a villain?

altTitles.th: ไบโอฮาซาร์ด วิกฤตโรงเรียนนรก

altTitles.ja: バイオハザード ～マルハワデザイア～

description.en: Chris Redfield is sent by the Bioterrorism Security Assessment Alliance (BSAA) to investigate a series of biohazard incidents occurring in Marhawa School, Asia's largest elite school in a certain country in the Far East.

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~

altTitles.ja: ティアムーン帝国物語～断頭台から始まる、姫の転生逆転ストーリー～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: The Reincarnation Reversal Story of the Princess, Starting from the Guillotine

altTitles.th: บันทึกเรื่องราวจักรวรรดิเทียร์มูน จุดพลิกผันชะตากรรมของเจ้าหญิงเริ่มจากบนกิโยติน

altTitles.zh: 迪阿姆帝国物语 ～从断头台开始的、公主的转生逆转传

altTitles.zh-hk: 堤亞穆帝國物語～從斷頭台開始，公主重生後的逆轉人生～

altTitles.en: Tearmoon Empire Story: Beginning from the Guillotine, a Story of a Reincarnated Princess Making a Turn Around

altTitles.vi: Biên niên sử về đế chế Tearmoon

description.en:
In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self??

To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures… "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" 

Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
description.ja: 崩壊したティアムーン帝国で、わがまま姫と蔑まれた皇女ミーアは処刑された――はずが、目覚めた彼女は12歳の少女に逆戻り？？ 第二の人生でギロチンを回避するため、帝政の建て直しを決意する。手始めに忠義に厚い下っ端メイドと、左遷されかけた優秀な文官を味方につけ、失敗した過去をやり直す日々が始まった。けれど、ミーアの本音は「我が身の安全第一」。仇敵を遠ざけ、人脈作りに励むうちに、なぜか周囲の忖度で次々と奇跡が実現！やがて、身勝手なはずの行動は大陸全土の未来を大きく変えていくのだった……。保身上等！自己中最強！小心者の元(？)ポンコツ姫が前世の記憶を使って運命に抗う、一世一代の歴史改変ファンタジー！
description.es-la: En el Imperio Tearmoon, la despreciada princesa egoísta Mia fue sentenciada a muerte, ¡O al menos se suponía que debía serlo! ¿En cambio, ella se despertó como su yo de doce años? Para evitar la guillotina en su segunda vida, no repetirá sus fracasos pasados​​... "¡P-para mí, algo de este nivel es una tarea fácil!" ¡Última defensa personal! ¡Autoconciencia más fuerte! Usando su imagen de princesa tímida y previamente torpe, irá en contra del destino, ¡Una fantasía única en la vida de arreglar la historia!

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 落郷文士伝

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

description.en:
What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

To LOVE Ru -Trouble- Special Oneshot -Mikan & Malulu-

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの勇者は、ダンジョンが出現した現実世界で、インフルエンサーになって金を稼ぎます！

altTitles.en: The Hero Returns from Another World, Becomes an Influencer, and Earns Money in the Real World, Where Dungeons have Appeared!

description.en: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
description.ja: ある日異世界へ召喚された普通の高校生が、着実にモンスターを倒しレベルを上げ、無事魔王を倒し、世界を救うことに成功！　その最強ステータスのまま現実社会に帰還することに――！？
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de secundaria normal y corriente es llevado a otro mundo. Sube su nivel en el otro mundo, derrota con éxito al Rey Demonio y salva el mundo. Con su nivel más fuerte, decide volver a su mundo. Sin embargo, en el mundo al que regresa, ha aparecido también una nueva "mazmorra". Una moderna fantasía de mazmorras en la que el antiguo héroe se convierte en un guerrero, ¡que se adentra en las mazmorras creadas en su propio mundo!

altTitles.en: I Will Temporarily Protect the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: オオカミ皇太子を保護しています

description.en:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

こどものままでもママになりたい！ ドキドキ☆はっぴーほーむ

description.en:
Three elementary school aged girls - Misaki, Saya, and Marika - suddenly arrive at your house. They come from different environments and have different personalities, but an AI has determined that they are extremely compatible with you as a family and it has decided to put you together to live under one roof. The three of them may seem like just young children, but they will heal you with their big love for you in a motherly way.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title.en: Omae ga Sekai wo Kowashitai nara

altTitles.en: If You Want to Destroy the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Omae ga Sekai o Kowashitai Nara

altTitles.ja: おまえが世界をこわしたいなら

description.en: Koizumi Kanna is infatuated with the man who came to the restaurant she works at and ordered a burger with no onions. Little does she know, Toujou Ren is interested in her as well, but for a different reason. Kanna just so happens to be the mirror image of a woman he knew a very long time ago. It is for that reason that he saves her when she nearly dies in a car accident. But the life he gives Kanna is far different from the one she lived before, and she's not certain it's the kind she wants…

title.en: The Villainess' Blind Date Is Too Perfect

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Boyfriend Is So Perfect
The Villain's Match Is Too Perfect
The Devil's Match Is Too Perfect

altTitles.zh: 恶女的相亲对象太完美了

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Match Is Too Perfect

description.en:
Possessed by the rumored evil woman ‘Yvonne Argenthoz’! In her original work, she was a villain who met a tragic end because she was jealous of the female lead with her male lead, but after being possessed by her, Yvonne resolves to enjoy the life of a diamond spoon in peace.

But the novel and development are different?!

“If it’s Yvonne's… fishery, I think it’ll be fine.”

From the perfect match going straight to Yvonne out of the blue, and the unexpected dark side of the story. Will Yvonne be able to live a peaceful diamond spoon life as planned?

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
description.ja: 20××年、少子化対策として「恋愛」が必修科目となった。男子高校生・秦野満月は奥手ゆえに落第寸前に陥り、恋愛落第生となった幼なじみ・可愛川茜と恋愛の補習を受けることに…!?
description.vi: Vào năm 20XX, Luật Giáo dục Tình yêu đã được ban hành. \"Tình yêu\" đã trở thành một chủ đề bắt buộc để đối phó với tỷ lệ sinh giảm.Tahano Mitsuki, một học sinh trung học đã từ bỏ sự lãng mạn và chăm chỉ học tập, đang trên bờ vực thất bại ở trường. Khi anh ấy tham gia một lớp học bổ sung để tránh học lại lớp, Mai Aihara, một cô gái xinh đẹp là một đứa trẻ có vấn đề, xuất hiện như là đối tác của anh ấy...? Đột nhiên, anh bắt đầu nghiên cứu tình yêu một mình với cô gái xinh đẹp trong ba C. Tiếp xúc gần, khu vực gần gũi và sau cánh cửa đóng kín! Aihara-san có bí mật gì không...? Một bộ phim hài lãng mạn học hỏi tình yêu giữa một cô gái JK xinh đẹp và một chàng trai.

title.en: The Villainous Duke's Daughter's Special Method of Growing Rice

altTitles.ko: 악역 공작 영애의 특별한 쌀 재배법

description.en: When you transmigrate into a novel as the villainess destined to die, there are different ways to survive: flirting with the male lead, learning to fight, or finding happiness elsewhere—but not Erica! She has decided to become a successful rice farmer just like in her past life! What follows is an epic (and rather surreal) quest to find the last rice seeds in the world, tame a giant rabbit magic beast, recruit magicians to water the fields, and—Wait, did she just turn the Holy Sword into a hoe?!

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

description.en:
A man who was once called the world’s strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organization’s ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.  
  
This is the story of a man, who, based on the memories and the experiences of his previous life, became a teacher who travels through the world with his students.  
  
Adaptation of a Light Novel.  
  


---
description.ru:
Некогда сильнейший агент, Сириус, пожертвовав собой ради товарищей, переродился в другом мире.  
  
Не успев закончить подготовку своих преемников в прошлом мире, он, вооружившись оставшимися знаниями и опытом, берётся учить окружающих его людей и круто меняет всю их жизнь. Для одних он станет наставником, а для других — быть может, чем-то большим…  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In Russian by/на русском [Istari Comics Publishing/Истари комикс](https://readmanga.live/world_teacher__other_world_style_education___agent)

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

altTitles.ja: 狼とリボルバー

description.en:
The protagonist is Oto, a young police woman. Around the village of Blume, where she lives, werewolves have started to appear, blending in with the village people. One day, Oto follows some village children into the forest, and unluckily, she encounters a werewolf. Just as the werewolf attacks her, another werewolf suddenly appears and saves her life. That werewolf apparently knows her somehow...

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

title.en: "Osananajimi ga Hoshii" to Tsubuyaitara Yoku Issho ni Asobu Onna Tomodachi no Yousu ga Hen ni Nattanda ga

altTitles.ja: 「幼馴染みがほしい」と呟いたらよく一緒に遊ぶ女友達の様子が変になったんだが

altTitles.ja-ro: "Osananajimi ga Hoshī" to Tsubuyaitara Yoku Issho ni Asobu Onna Tomodachi no Yōsu ga Hen ni Nattanda ga

altTitles.en: When I Murmured, "I Want a Childhood Friend," the Behavior of My Female Friend I Often Hang Out with Changed.

description.en:
―It was a casual remark made by Akito while having lunch with his usual friend group of four. However, he didn't know that the person sitting right in front of him, Natsumi, was actually his childhood friend who had moved away when they were small!

Since then, Natsumi has been trying to express her feelings to Akito, but because they had always been friends, it hasn't been easy for her to convey them...

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活　－オンとオフ－

altTitles.en: Company and Private Life: On and Off

altTitles.es-la: Vida empresarial y privada: ON y OFF

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

altTitles.ja: ぱにぽに

description.en: A new teacher is assigned to Momotsuki Academy. Her name is Rebecca Miyamoto, or Becky. She is short, but she is pretty smart. This is a school comedy performed by Becky and strange students… and animals!?

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~

altTitles.ja: ギャルメイドと悪役令嬢 ～おじょーさまのハッピーエンドしか勝たん！～

altTitles.en: Gal Maid & Villainess: Only Milady's Happy End Will Win!

altTitles.pl: Modna Służka i Antagonistka: Liczy Się Tylko Pomyślność Mojej Pani!

description.en: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
description.ja: ギャルのセリナが転生したのは、オタクな友達に激推しされてハマった乙女ゲームの世界だった！モブキャラに転生していたセリナは親の借金のカタで売られ、悪役令嬢・アルメリアのもとでメイドをすることになるが…。
description.pl: Gyaru o imieniu Serina zostaje reinkarnowana w świecie gry otome jako postać drugoplanowa, która zostaje sprzedana przez swoją rodzinę i teraz pracuje jako ekskluzywna pokojówka złoczyńcy Almelii. Yuri romcom
description.pt-br: Uma gyaru chamada Serina é reencarnada no mundo de um Otome game (jogo de "namoro"), como uma personagem secundária que é vendida por sua família e agora trabalha como a empregada exclusiva da vilã do jogo, Almelia. Confusões românticas Yuri de forma hilariantes se desdobram.

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.en: A Girl and Life to Live…Enormous Breast Paradise

altTitles.ja: Chi Chi Chi Chi
Chichichichi

altTitles.th: หัวนมหัวนมหัวนมหัวนม

altTitles.ja: チチチチ

altTitles.es-la: Una Chica y una vida que vivir....Un paraíso de enormes Tetas.

description.en: One day, a picture book writer named Yorozu Hikaru was asked by his close online friend, Chintarou, if they could share a room together while he attended a nearby university. Although they only knew each other through online interactions, Hikaru agrees to it without much thought. However unbeknownst to Hikaru, Chintarou, despite having a male name, is actually a girl: a very well endowed girl.
description.es-la:
Un día, a un autor de libros ilustrados quién se llama Yorozu Hikaru, su amigo cercano de internet, llamado Chintarou, le pidió que le compartiera un cuarto en su casa, en lo que atendía la universidad. 
A pesar de que solo han interactuado en línea, Hikaru acepto sin pensarlo dos veces. Sin embargo y para su sorpresa, Chintarou, a pesar de tener un nombre masculino, es en realidad una chica: Una chica muy atractiva.
description.pt-br: Um dia, um escritor de ilustrador de livros chamado Yorozu Hiraku foi convidado pelo seu amigo próximo, Chintarou, se eles pudessem dividir um quarto juntos enquanto ele frequentava uma universidade próxima. Embora eles só se conhecessem através de interações online, Hikaru concorda com isso sem pensar muito. No entanto, sem o conhecimento de Hikaru, Chintarou, apesar de ter um nome masculino, é na verdade uma menina: uma garota muito bem dotada.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の教育係 ～勇者学院を追放された平民教師は魔王の娘たちの家庭教師となる～

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

title.en: Cheat Mode Farming in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Yurufuwa Nouka no Mojibake Skill ~Isekai de Catalog Tsuuhan Yattemasu~

altTitles.ja: ゆるふわ農家の文字化けスキル ~異世界でカタログ通販やってます~

altTitles.id: Bertani di Dunia Lain Dengan Mode Cheat

altTitles.pt-br: Agricultura no modo cheat em outro mundo

altTitles.es: Habilidades Trampa de Granja en Otro Mundo

description.en:
Tatsuya, a 29-year-old bachelor, gets accidentally summoned to another world and obtains [Agricultural Skills]. 

In order to survive, he starts a vegetable garden in a secluded forest. He thought that his life in another world would be extremely difficult, but the ingredients in this other world were delicious and the crops he grew on his own were also very delicious! Furthermore, he's also very happy with the dishes he made with Japanese seasonings! 

(Typical. Rice and sake are going to be a staple apparently, but you guys know the drill. )

Besides, if there are beautiful brides, isn't it okay if he lives in this other world? Loose and fluffy, a relaxing other world harem life!
description.es: Tatsuya, un soltero de 29 años, es invocado a otro mundo por alguna razón y debido a eso logra despertar [Habilidades agrícolas]. Inicia un huerto para sobrevivir en un bosque remoto. "Creo que vivir en un mundo diferente es extremadamente difícil, y aunque los ingredientes en él suelen ser deliciosos, mis propios productos agrícolas también son muy deliciosos. Además, estoy muy satisfecho con los platos elaborados con condimentos japoneses, el arroz y sake son deliciosos. Y si hay novias hermosas, ¿no hace que este mundo sea aun mejor?" ¡Viviendo una vida relajada y acaramelada con su harem en un mundo diferente!
description.pt-br: Um homem solteiro de 29 anos é invocado para outro mundo. recebendo uma habilidade de agricultura level 1. Crie uma casa, faça uma horta e viva uma tranquila vida isolada na floresta. Com bebidas e comidas deliciosas de sua colheita e lindas garotas, não tem coisa melhor.

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Comédia Romântica de Reencarnação entre um Herói e uma Feiticeira

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

altTitles.ja: 休日のわるものさん

altTitles.fr: Monsieur Méchant va détruire la terre après ses congés
Monsieur méchant en jour de congé

altTitles.th: คุณวายร้ายกับวันหยุดสบาย ๆ ของเขา

altTitles.vi: Ngày nghỉ của ngài phản diện

description.en:
There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.  
  
The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force, the "Rangers!"  
  
However, today is his day off.

---

Additional Official English Release | [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/)
description.pt-br:
Existe uma organização maligna que almeja invadir o planeta Terra.

Um de seus membros, o General, luta todo dia contra as Forças Defensivas da Terra, mais conhecidos como Os Rangers.

Porém, hoje é o dia de folga dele.
